rgbHexConverter.title: RGB/Hex Color Converter
rgbHexConverter.description: Use this tool to convert RGB values to Hex color codes or vice versa.
rgbHexConverter.inputPlaceholder:
Enter RGB values or Hex color code.
RGB example: RGB(255, 0, 0) / 255, 0, 0
Hex example: #FF0000 / ff0000 / f00
rgbHexConverter.noInputError: The input field is empty. Please check and provide the necessary input.
rgbHexConverter.invalidColorError: Invalid color code. Please check and try again.

rgbToHex.title: Convert RGB to Hex
rgbToHex.description: The process of converting RGB values into hexadecimal (Hex) color codes.

steps.1: Input three numbers representing RGB values in the range of 0 to 255.
steps.2: Convert each number to a hexadecimal value.
steps.3: Combine the three hexadecimal values to get the final Hex code.

hexToRgb.title: Convert Hex to RGB
hexToRgb.description: The process of converting a hexadecimal (Hex) color code into RGB values.

steps.1: Input a Hex code consisting of 6 characters (numbers and letters).
steps.2: Convert each pair of characters to a decimal value.
steps.3: Combine the three resulting numbers to get the final RGB value.

steps.1: Enter an RGB or Hex color code in the input field.
steps.2: Click the convert button to see the result.
steps.3: Check the converted value in the result area.
steps.4: Click the copy button next to the result to copy it to the clipboard.

security.title: Security Notice

freeUsage.title: Free to Use

example.title: Conversion Example
example.description: For example, RGB(255, 0, 0) converts to #FF0000, and the Hex code #00FF00 converts to RGB(0, 255, 0).
